subject: Mountain Bike page - two problems

comments.value:
Hi,

I've noticed a discrepancy between the Mountain Bike page in CMS and on the live website.

In CMS, there's a 'Who' section on the right hand side of the page as below. However, this box is not present on the live website. Do you have any idea why this might be happening??

Also, the Hadleigh Farm venue box is not coming through on this Mountain Biking page. I've added the Hadleigh Farm tag, but for some reason it's not triggering the box to come through. Do you know what might be causing this?

Just a thought - might these two issues be linked, and be due to a limit on the number of boxes that can be shown on a page?

Thanks




[cid:image001.png@01CBFF5A.368F94B0]

Michael Thorne
Content Coordinator
Editorial Services department

subject: RE: Mountain Bike page - two problems

comments.value:
Hi,

Both of these issues have now been fixed so don't need any more attention.

Thanks

From: Michael Thorne
Sent: 20 April 2011 13:03
To: 'notifications-support@postcms.zendesk.com'
Subject: Mountain Bike page - two problems

Hi,

I've noticed a discrepancy between the Mountain Bike page in CMS and on the live website.

In CMS, there's a 'Who' section on the right hand side of the page as below. However, this box is not present on the live website. Do you have any idea why this might be happening??

Also, the Hadleigh Farm venue box is not coming through on this Mountain Biking page. I've added the Hadleigh Farm tag, but for some reason it's not triggering the box to come through. Do you know what might be causing this?

Just a thought - might these two issues be linked, and be due to a limit on the number of boxes that can be shown on a page?

Thanks
